author: Douglas Belkin
title: Virus Vigilantes Shunning and Shaming...
description: Virus Vigilantes Shunning and Shaming... (First column, 11th story, link ) Related stories: Tourist Towns Plead, 'Please Stay Away,' During Lockdowns... Visit this Colorado county and go to jail...
content:
Lake Forest, Ill.Last week, William Zordani and his large family took their Golden Retriever, Sunshine, for a walk near their home in this leafy suburb north of Chicago as they waited out the coronavirus shutdown.
That evening, a woman who lives a few blocks… [+211 chars]
